name: places/ChIJfyJPMu31wokR0VfdT04Hx6I
formattedAddress: 260 Audubon Ave, New York, NY 10033, USA
adrFormatAddress: 260 Audubon Ave, New York, NY 10033, USA

originalText.text: My daughter is learning alot.  Yesterday, SHE taught me how to say 'more' in American sign language.  Come on...SHE TAUGHT ME!!!  I also appreciate that I can see her at anytime I wish threw webcam.  The daycare people are very caring.  My daughter loves them.  I feel fortunate we found this daycare.

text.text: My daughter is learning alot.  Yesterday, SHE taught me how to say 'more' in American sign language.  Come on...SHE TAUGHT ME!!!  I also appreciate that I can see her at anytime I wish threw webcam.  The daycare people are very caring.  My daughter loves them.  I feel fortunate we found this daycare.

originalText.text: We believed the rave reviews and were impressed by their marketing and their website. The fees and the weekly rate are not worth the headache. The staff could not communicate with us because of the language barrier, they kept my son strapped to a rocker for most of the day. He was there for six long hours!  We cringed as we watched them take turns rocking him in an effort to keep him quiet and/or to put him to sleep for the second time. He was not stimulated and they did not follow the lovely curriculum that they send to parents once the fees are paid. We enrolled my daughter in the after school program, only to learn that their handbook is inconsistent with the services that they truly offer. Parents, take your time searching for day care for your children. Don’t be fooled into these fancy websites and exorbitant fees. When my daughter was 10 months old, we enrolled her into a local day care that had no cameras, no support staff and no fancy website, but at pickup time, she would cry because she didn’t want to leave. My son cried into my husband’s arms when he was picked up yesterday. Maybe it was a sigh of relief. We’ll never know. Parents, you have been warned! Choose wisely.

originalText.text: I am happy with the daycare.  Teachers are very attentive, camera is a big plus . I get pictures  though app daily . I know my child is having fun and learning every day.

text.text: I am happy with the daycare.  Teachers are very attentive, camera is a big plus . I get pictures  though app daily . I know my child is having fun and learning every day.

originalText.text: We had a terrible experience with this location.  We were willing to give it another shot at another location, but the owner did not appreciate our constructive criticism and transparency. We are happy with our decision and encourage all parents to take their time searching for quality day care these days.  Do not be swayed by the fancy websites. All in all, go with your gut. My son cried a sigh a relief when he was picked up yesterday.  That is not acceptable.

originalText.text:
As a first time mom it was extremely difficult to find a trust worthy daycare for my 5 month old. B&J not only has a welcoming and caring staff but the technology to reassure that things are going smoothly (surveillance and app with food & diaper log ins)

Tuition is a little on the expensive side but it's worth it.
